name: Escape This: Subway: Volume 2
description:
This collection includes Escape This Subway, Escape This Salon, Escape Garden, and Escape This Fairytale.

Escape This is a series of escape room games that have you racing against the clock to finish solving various puzzles. You will be transported to different locations, and face new challenges where you'll have to use whatever is at your disposal to complete the puzzles before your time's up. Be careful, making mistakes will get you shocked and deplete your health. Are you ready to beat every level and be an escape room champion?

  • Great with friends and family, in person and on Zoom meetings, or any other screen-sharing software

Let us know if you find any bugs. Report them here in the comments section. Thanks.
